mapper.select: select t.id,g.goods_name goodsName,u.unit_name unit,t.standard_weight weight,t.goods_price price,t.quanity number,g.goods_image goodsImage from t_whs_order_goods t LEFT JOIN t_whs_goods_standard s on t.goods_standard_id=s.id LEFT JOIN t_whs_goods g on g.id=s.goods_id LEFT JOIN t_whs_goods_unit u on u.unit_code=s.unit_code where t.order_id=#{orderId}
select check_status from t_whs_debt_order do where do.order_ids LIKE concat('%',#{orderCode},'%') ORDER BY do.create_time desc LIMIT 1
